dcterms:description: The MuJoCo Reacher domain is a continuous control environment where the goal is to move a robotic arm to reach a target position. It is part of the DeepMind Control Suite, which provides a variety of tasks for reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: MuJoCo Reacher domain

dcterms:creator: H. Van Seijen
H. Nekoei
E. Racah
S. Chandar
dcterms:description: The GridWorldLoCA domain is a tabular environment designed to evaluate model-based behavior in reinforcement learning. It allows for the assessment of an agent's ability to adapt to local changes in the reward structure.
dcterms:title: GridWorldLoCA domain

dcterms:creator: Y. Tassa
Y. Doron
A. Muldal
T. Erez
Y. Li
D. d. L. Casas
D. Budden
A. Abdolmaleki
J. Merel
A. Lefrancq
dcterms:description: The ReacherLoCA domain is a modified version of the Reacher environment from the DeepMind Control Suite, designed to evaluate the adaptivity of reinforcement learning algorithms in a continuous-action setting.
dcterms:title: ReacherLoCA domain

dcterms:creator: A. W. Moore
dcterms:description: The MountainCarLoCA domain is a variant of the MountainCar problem, designed to evaluate the adaptivity of reinforcement learning algorithms in a continuous control setting with local changes in the reward structure.
dcterms:title: MountainCarLoCA domain
